Articles.Content:
So my family has found out the perfect way to make your dogs fart. Feed them a diet of Cheerios and cat food about three days before, and they'll start farting like crazy!

I'm not joking this has actually worked for us...

You are 12. Heh.
try avacadoes. but get gas masks first.

For my 18 year old cat, fish. She will clear a house in 3 minutes flat even if she eats a small piece of fish...

Edit: I should elaborate, it comes out both ends, her breath smells of decaying fish and then yeah...
